com.github.erchu.beancp

Class Converter<S,D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.erchu.beancp.Converter<S,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - conversion source class.
    D - conversion destination class.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    MappingExecutor<S,D>

    public final class Converter<S,D>
extends Object
implements MappingExecutor<S,D>
    Converter used to convert source to usually immutable new destination object.
